meaningMnemonic: In its <radical>scooter</radical>, a <radical>cat pirate</radical> scoots up to <kanji>welcome</kanji> you!
readingMnemonic: The cat pirate then launches into a speech about how they <kanji>welcome</kanji> all kinds of people. Especially <reading>gay</reading> (げい) people. He puts a certain emphasis on gay, so you figure that the cat pirate either thinks you're gay or wants you to be.
